description:
Move into the light; go tubeless. This biodegradable sealant is a blend of fast-setting latex and mixed-sized particles that dam punctures upto ¼-inch quickly and effectively.

  • Maintains performance at extreme temperatures and altitudes
  • Made from biodegradable ingredients
  • Adding sealant to a tire only adds only 120g of weight to a wheel
name: Orange Seal Tubeless Tire Sealant - Regular Refill
